adaa.analytics.rules.logic.representation

Class RuleSetBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.operator.AbstractIOObject
      • com.rapidminer.operator.ResultObjectAdapter
        • com.rapidminer.operator.AbstractModel
          • com.rapidminer.operator.learner.PredictionModel
            • com.rapidminer.operator.learner.SimplePredictionModel
              • adaa.analytics.rules.logic.representation.RuleSetBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.rapidminer.operator.IOObject, com.rapidminer.operator.Model, com.rapidminer.operator.ResultObject, com.rapidminer.report.Readable, com.rapidminer.report.Reportable, com.rapidminer.tools.LoggingHandler, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassificationRuleSet, RegressionRuleSet, SurvivalRuleSet

    public abstract class RuleSetBase
extends com.rapidminer.operator.learner.SimplePredictionModel
    Abstract class representing all rule-based models (classification/regression/survival).
    See Also:

        public RuleSetBase.Significance calculateSignificance(double alpha)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Generates text representation of the rule set which contains:

        • induction parameters,
        • user's knowledge (if defined),
        • list of rules,
        • information about coverage of the training set examples.
        Specified by:
        toString in interface com.rapidminer.report.Readable
        Overrides:
        toString in class com.rapidminer.operator.learner.PredictionModel
        Returns:
        Rule set in the text form.
